channel.title: Can someone tell me a code to let maker attack anyone anywhere?
channel.description:
Can someone tell me a code to let maker attack anyone anywhere??????? This would make me so happy once i get a server going. If someone is being unfair or nooby, they die!!!!
Also, could u tell me where to actually put the code? Ty ;)

item.title: Can someone tell me a code to let maker attack anyone anywhere?
item.dc:creator: @higzta higzta
item.description:
@higzta wrote:

can u just tell me my error?

item.title: Can someone tell me a code to let maker attack anyone anywhere?
item.dc:creator: @higzta higzta
item.description:
@higzta wrote:

ok, i tried to do what you told me, and i got 2 errors:

[code]if (ItemName.startsWith(“Bronze”)) {
return 1;
} else if (ItemName.startsWith(“Iron”)) {
return 1;
} else if (ItemName.startsWith(“Steel”)) {
return 5;
} else if (ItemName.startsWith(“Black”)) {
return 10;
} else if (ItemName.startsWith(“Mithril”)) {
return 20;
} else if (ItemName.startsWith(“Adamant”)) {
return 30;
} else if (ItemName.startsWith(“Rune”)) {
return 40;
} else if (ItemName.startsWith(“Dragon”)) {
return 60;
} {
inWildyrange = true;

	} else if (ItemName.startsWith("Granite")) {
		return 50;
	} else if (ItemName.endsWith("whip") || ItemName.endsWith("Ahrims staff") || ItemName.endsWith("Torags hammers") || ItemName.endsWith("Veracs flail") || ItemName.endsWith("Guthans warspear") || ItemName.endsWith("Dharoks greataxe")) {
		return 70;
	}
	return 1;
}[/code]

Read full topic
item.source: Can someone tell me a code to let maker attack anyone anywhere?

item.title: Can someone tell me a code to let maker attack anyone anywhere?
item.dc:creator: @Chaosis Chaosis
item.description:
@Chaosis wrote:

Well, idk about this but try something like…

inWildyrange = true

Thats it lol. Put that with whatever weapon you got. Like search for (itemname.startswith(“Bronze”) and put it below that line, in client.java, then all bronze weapons would attack anyone anywhere.

Read full topic

item.title: Can someone tell me a code to let maker attack anyone anywhere?
item.dc:creator: @Verac Verac
item.description:
@Verac wrote:

I cant tell you this being as I dont know but i would also like to ask the same thing and rather than making a useless thread saying the same thing i want to state my question, Rather than Let the maker how about does anyone know a code to let users with level 3 status attack anyone anywhere? For example system admins and GMs?

Read full topic
